actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The mastermind makes two Arcane Shock or Dagger of the Poisoned Mind attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Shock
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 26 (4d10 + 4 damage) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Dagger of the Poisoned Mind
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mastermind casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
